metadata.name: HackTool - CoercedPotato Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of CoercedPotato, a tool for privilege escalation

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\coercedpotato.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --exploitid ')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=a75d7669db6b2e107a44c4057ff7f7d6')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=f91624350e2c678c5dcbe5e1f24e22c9')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=14c81850a079a87e83d50ca41c709a15'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of CoercedPotato, a tool for privilege escalation
